entry.title: New release for Revolt: 0.8.4
entry.content:
Changes: - Allow sending a message with broken replies (i.e. omit them if desired)

Fixes: - Allow message pins in Direct Messages - Apply the given icon when creating a group - Allow bots to create and delete server emoji

Maintenance: - New test harness methods - Ensure gated features are exposed in generated API documentation

Pull Requests

  • test: Add tests for invite/fetch by @phazeschift in https://github.com/revoltchat/backend/pull/403
  • feat: allow to set an icon when creating a group chat by @nponsard in https://github.com/revoltchat/backend/pull/397
  • fix: allow message pinning and unpinning for DM-like channels by @StupidRepo in https://github.com/revoltchat/backend/pull/399
  • Allow bots to manage emojis by @xXBuilderBXx in https://github.com/revoltchat/backend/pull/407
  • feat: add option to send message with missing replies by @shaksternano in https://github.com/revoltchat/backend/pull/408

entry.title: New release for Revolt: 0.8.5
entry.content:
Changes: - Mass mention support (@everyone, @online) - this does not mean it's going into production yet - Make the 'your account already exists' email more clear to users - Add support for starttls mail servers - Add support for the easypwned API (local HIBP compromised password lookup)

Fixes: - Show full branch name on GitHub webhook messages - Don't leak invisible presence to other users - Add back missing early adopter badges

Maintenance: - Correct documentation regarding override configuration - Remove the Node.js bindings crate - Enable lto in release builds

Pull Requests

  • Add Mass Mentions to the backend by @IAmTomahawkx in https://github.com/revoltchat/backend/pull/394
  • docs: correct Revolt config override filename by @ELginas in https://github.com/revoltchat/backend/pull/410
  • feat: new parser for mention everything by @insertish in https://github.com/revoltchat/backend/pull/411
  • fix: Actually create crond container in github workflow by @Docteh in https://github.com/revoltchat/backend/pull/413

New Contributors

  • @ELginas made their first contribution in https://github.com/revoltchat/backend/pull/410
  • @Docteh made their first contribution in https://github.com/revoltchat/backend/pull/413

Full Changelog: https://github.com/revoltchat/backend/compare/20250402-2...20250510-1

entry.title: New release for Revolt: 0.8.6
entry.content:

Hot fixes in 20250514-1: - authifier: migration should not use transactions - database: more verbose logging for acks
